title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: Suits Star Rick Hoffman Returning as Louis Litt on NBC Spinoff
description: Rick Hoffman is bringing some Louis Litt energy to Suits LA. The actor, who starred in all nine seasons of the original USA Network drama, will reprise his role in an episode of the NBC offshoot, TVLine has confirmed. Hoffman is expected to appear in just one episode, but the door is open for him […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Trump’s Joint Address to Congress Draws 36.6 Million Viewers, Hitting a Three-Year High
description: Lots of Americans tuned in to see what President Donald Trump has in mind for his second term in office: 36.6 million viewers watched Trump’s joint address to Congress on Tuesday, Nielsen has announced, marking a three-year high for the annual speech. (Note: A President’s first speech to Congress is not technically considered a “State […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: When Calls the Heart Season 12 Episode 10 Spoilers: The Dispute Over McGinty’s Meadow Heats Up
description: McGinty won't give up, and the land dispute becomes nasty on When Calls the Heart Season 12 Episode 10. Check out the details. The post When Calls the Heart Season 12 Episode 10 Spoilers: The Dispute Over McGinty’s Meadow Heats Up appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Laura Nowak

title: With CBS Being so Spinoff-Happy, This Blue Bloods Prequel Needs to Happen
description: CBS has ordered at least 5 spinoffs for 2026, including a new gig for Blue Bloods' Danny Reagan. So why not a Blue Bloods prequel too? The post With CBS Being so Spinoff-Happy, This Blue Bloods Prequel Needs to Happen appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jack Ori
